caption: Table 1: The values these two variables can take are outlined in the following joint distribution table.
description: This table shows a joint probability distribution for two variables, y (disease) and t (temperature).  The probabilities are shown for different combinations of disease (a or b) and temperature (99, 100, 101, or 102). The marginal probabilities for each variable are also shown.
section: H Zero-shot prediction using the score function
